item.description: 오늘 한 것 SWEA 문제 풀이 # 최소합 dx, dy = [0,1], [1,0] def dfs(x,y): global min_num, result visit[x][y] = 1 if result < min_num: return if x == n-1 and y == n-1: result = min_num return for i in range(2): nx = x + dx[i] ny = y + dy[i] if 0 <= nx < n and 0 <= ny < n and visit[nx][ny] == 0: min_num += a[nx][ny] dfs(nx,ny) visit[nx][ny] = 0 min_num -= a[nx][ny] for t in range(int(input())): n = int(input()) a = [list(map(int, input().
